title: Login & Logout
description: Once you logged in Spotify collects your user data and stores things of a demographic nature or e.g. the time you dwelled on Spotify. The amount of registration data varies dependend on the registration type, third party accounts (like facebook) facilitate the gathering of even more data.

title: Time
description: Date and time are important indicators for Spotify not only during streaming their service but also beyond the use of Spotify. For example the time your computer has been running since the last boot is also tracked.

title: Network Quality
description: When you're on the go even network qualities are inspected and stored. Spotify detects which generation of network you are using.

title: Location
description: If you have turned off your location, Spotify still can allocate you to an approximate location. The IP address of your digital device can be used to find it out.

title: Canvas Size
description: Another technical data that is collected by Spotify is the canvas size of the wep app.

title: Device Information
description: The Spotify application can extract pretty much information out of the devices that are streaming the music.

title: Click Interactions
description: Spotify is able to capture and store your click interactions. It could be important for them to know which song was skipped or ad was clicked.

title: Feelings & Emotions
description: Did you know that besides data, emotions can also be stored? Whether you're listening to a happy or a sad song, Spotify can map your mood. According to their Web API reference, each song is described by its mood.

title: Accessory
description: Once you plug in your personal accessory it is dead easy for Spotify to acquire information about it. For example the brand of your headphones.

title: Share
description: Spotify remembers it every time you share a song, album, or artist with your friends. For example, it is recorded with what intent you share the content or whether you changed the placeholder text when sending it.

title: Social
description: If you allow certain settings, Spotify can also access your entire contact list. On Facebook, Spotify even has access to your friends' pictures and names.

title: Device orientation
description: In certain situations, Spotify remembers the orientation of your device. The value -1 stands for the horizontal alignment of your phone. 0 means that you held your phone in portrait mode.

title: User Interface Interaction
description: In addition to the orientation of your phone, every touchscreen interaction is recorded. A distinction is made between the input methods hit, drag and swipe. It also records what the goal of the interaction was.
